name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **Python**, and experienced with **Vue.js**, and **Django Rest Framework**. Skilled in event-driven architecture, utilizing **AWS**, **GCP**, and deploying cloud-native applications. Well-versed in **NoSQL databases** including **MongoDB** and **DynamoDB**, and adept at using **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI** for CI/CD automation. Hands-on experience with **Kubernetes** to manage microservices and streamline deployment.

Adept at building AI/ML-powered solutions leveraging **Celery** for task queues and **EventBridge** for event routing. Strong background in observability practices using **DataDog** and a commitment to test automation and Agile software development, fostering a collaborative environment that prioritizes customer value. Known for a growth mindset and continuous improvement, demonstrating self-motivation and a bias for action in all projects.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed robust applications utilizing **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, and **Python** within a **Django Rest Framework** environment, ensuring optimal user experience and system performance.
• Designed NoSQL databases like **MongoDB** to support event-driven architectures for diverse applications, ensuring efficient data management and retrieval.
• Employed **AWS** services including **Lambda**, **DynamoDB**, and **EventBridge** in a cloud-native application design, enhancing scalability and reliability with **Kubernetes** orchestration.
• Built CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**, integrating test automation strategies to enforce code quality and speed up deployment cycles, achieving a **30%** reduction in deployment time.
• Contributed to Agile software development practices in a collaborative environment, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and self-motivation across teams.
• Integrated observability practices using **DataDog** to monitor application performance, translating metrics into actionable insights that improved customer value.
• Championed test automation with frameworks such as Jest and Cypress, achieving **90%** coverage across unit and integration tests, ensuring the robustness of software releases.
• Engaged in the full software development lifecycle (SDLC) of features focused on growth mindset principles, prioritizing customer needs and rapid iteration based on feedback.
• Implemented advanced event-driven solutions with **Celery** for background task processing, improving system efficiency and response times for user interactions.
• Facilitated knowledge sharing and team collaboration, leveraging a bias for action to drive project milestones and adapt to changing project demands effectively.

• Leveraged **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, and **Python** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using Node.js (NestJS/Express) and Python (FastAPI, Django) for improved performance and scalability in high-volume transactional systems.
• Created interactive front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to deliver sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
• Delivered real-time analytics dashboards utilizing **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into over **1M transactions** and anomalies.
• Architected and deployed a resilient event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** for asynchronous communication across critical workflows including payments, alerts, and compliance, reducing latency by **30%**.
• Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, capable of both batch and real-time processing, successfully processing **500GB** of data daily.
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, facilitating proactive detection of suspicious activities based on user behavior and transaction patterns with a **95% accuracy rate**.
• Created machine learning pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification by integrating **MLflow** and **Airflow** to streamline model inference in backend services, achieving an automated prediction time of under **2 seconds**.

Develop high-quality backend services using **Python** (Django Rest Framework) and **Typescript** to ensure scalability and performance in a fast-paced, customer value-focused environment.
Design and implement sophisticated **Event-Driven Architecture** leveraging **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to enhance application responsiveness and data flow across modules, handling **over 1M** real-time data transactions monthly.
Utilize **NoSQL databases** like **MongoDB** and **DynamoDB** to optimize data storage and retrieval for high-traffic scenarios, achieving latency improvements of up to **30%** over previous implementations.
Create efficient CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI** allowing for automated testing and deployment, which reduces integration duration to less than **1 hour**.
Engage in Agile software development practices, working collaboratively with cross-functional teams to implement features that meet customer needs, focusing on continuous improvement and innovation.
Perform test automation and observability practices with tools like **DataDog**, ensuring system reliability and reducing downtime during deployments to less than **5 hours** per incident.
Integrate **AWS** and **GCP** services for cloud solutions, emphasizing cost-efficient resource management and ensuring high availability across applications.
Work with frontend frameworks such as **Vue.js** and libraries for enhanced user interactions, ensuring delivery of engaging user experiences that cater to mobile-first designs. 
Foster a growth mindset within the team by coaching peers on best practices in software engineering and encouraging self-motivation for professional development.
Drive efforts in implementing secure and compliant transaction workflows using third-party tools like **Stripe** and **PayPal**, ensuring PCI compliance with zero data breaches since implementation.
